title: God helps those who help themselves
desc: One minute on the stage needs ten years practice off stage

title: Easier said than done
desc: The membrance of the past is the teacher of the future

title: Where there is a will,there is a way
desc: You have to believe in yourself. That''s the secret of success

title: Slow and steady wins the race
desc: Judge not a book by its cover.(Never judge from appearances.)

title: More hasty,less speed
desc: It is better to be a head of dog than a tail of a lion..

title: It's never too old to learn
desc: He who sees through life and death will meet with most success.

title: Look before you leap
desc: The strong pass of the enemy is like a wall of iron, yet with firm strides we are conquring its summit

title: Great minds think alike
desc: My journey is long and winding, I will keep on exploring my way far and wide

title: First things first
desc: All the Evils to be considered with the Good, that is in them, and with that worse attends them

title: Beauty will buy no beef
desc: Make your whole year''s plan in the spring and the whole day''s plan in the morning

title: An idle youth,a needy age
desc: A man loves his sweetheart the most, his wife the best, but his mother the longest

title: The older, the wiser
desc: Ask not what your country can do for you; Ask what you can do for your country

title: AS the tree,so the fruit
desc: Early to bed, early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise

title: live not to eat,but eat to live
desc: Never put off until tomorrow what may be done today

title: Facts speak plainer than words
desc: Knowledge is a measure, but practise is the key to it

title: Out of sight,out of mind
desc: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labour does the body
